alert.note: Alert for Erie; Huron; Lorain (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 16 at 3:46PM EDT until April 16 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Huron County in north central Ohio... Erie County in north central Ohio... Lorain County in north central Ohio... * Until 430 PM EDT. * At 345 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line from Milan to New London, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Lorain, Elyria, Western Vermilion, Vermilion, Westlake, North Ridgeville, Avon Lake, Amherst, Grafton, Wellington, New London, Wakeman, North Olmsted, Avon, Bay Village, Sheffield Lake, Eaton, Oberlin, Sheffield and Lagrange. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
